revised_title: Explaining the Evolution of High Sperm Numbers and the Sperm-Number-Recombination Correlation
tldr: The authors explore the reasons behind the evolution of high sperm numbers and the correlation between sperm numbers and recombination rates. They propose a model that incorporates sib competition and sperm competitiveness to explain these phenomena. The model suggests that deleterious mutations affecting sperm competitiveness lead to sib or intra-ejaculate competition, and if inter-ejaculate competition exists, there will be selection for increased recombination.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Genetics and Evolution
